Washington DC Job Search Washington DC Careers and Employment. Home About
FroZenYo Eye Street Hiring (Farragut Metro West) Written by on March 22nd, 2011 FroZenYo Self Serve Frozen Yogurt is looking for energetic, bright and passionate people to join our team at our brand new store. Eye Street FroZenYo (at Farragut Metro West) will be opening very, very shortly and we are looking to fill full and part time positions. Please reply with your resume and list of references as well as a reasons you feel you would be a great addition to FroZenYo.
Location: Farragut Metro West Principals only. Recruiters, please don’t contact this job poster. Please, no phone calls about this job! Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.
Source: FroZenYo Eye Street Hiring (Farragut Metro West)

Diamond Gamble Says: July 17th, 2011 at 11:20 pm Diamond J. Gamble 1635 18th street apt 203 Washington DC,2002 Cell: 202-423-1327 Email: diamond.gamble@yahoo.com
Objective: To obtain a responsible and challenging position with a progressive company where my work experience will have valuable application and utilization of my opportunity for advancement.
Work Experience:
Cashier Fast Food Restaurant Jerry’s Sub and Pizza Suitland, Maryland April 2009–Present Perform a variety of duties in fast food restaurant. Request customer order and depresses keys of multi-counting machine to simultaneously record order and compute bill. Receives payment Selects requested food items from serving or storage areas and assembles items on serving tray or in takeout bag. Notifies kitchen personnel of shortages or special orders Serves cold beverages
Sales Associate Marshalls Forestville, Maryland July 2008 Maintaining outstanding customer service as per company standards; generating sales, merchandising, and safeguarding company assets. Ensure that each customer service outstanding service by providing a friendly environment, which includes greeting and acknowledging every customer, maintaining solid product knowledge and all other aspects of customer service. Maintain an awareness of all promotions and advertisements Assist in floor moves, merchandising, display maintenance, and housekeeping Assist in processing and replenishing merchandise and monitoring floor stock Aid customers in locating merchandise Communicate customer requests to management Assist in completing price changes within the department Assist in ringing up sales at registers and/or bagging merchandise Any other tasks as assigned from time to time by any manager
Cashier Fast Food Restaurant Dominos Pizza Forestville, Maryland May 2008 Provide fast, friendly and efficient service by suggestively selling menu items and merchandise. Take drink, appetizer, entrée and dessert orders and ensure that guests receive great service. Maintain a cheerful, courteous disposition Suggestively sell appetizers, entrées and dessert menu items by describing each item in an appetizing way Answers phone and ring in orders on POS (Point of Sales) quickly and in proper sequence, and use appropriate abbreviations and charges Maintain carry-out area Give warm farewell to guests and invite them to return Arrive to work on time, attend shift and monthly meetings on time Attend monthly cleaning crews to maintain restaurant cleanliness Adhere to company sanitation procedures Provide a favorable image of Dominos Pizza at all times to promote its objective and enhance public recognition of all its areas of endeavor Maintain a favorable working relationship with all other Dominos Pizza employees and guest to foster and promote a harmonious working climate that maximizes morale, productivity, and efficiency.
Education:
University of Maryland College Park B.A. Criminal Justice May 2013
Forestville Military Academy, Forestville Maryland High School Diploma; 2009
